snippet: With the support of friends August Montalbano has made through his Alcoholics Anonymous group, he has been able to keep a positive outlook in life.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps recovering alcoholic August Montalbano pay down rent arrears as he faces cancer diagnosis.
lead_paragraph: With the support of friends August Montalbano has made through his Alcoholics Anonymous group, he has been able to keep a positive outlook in life.

headline.main: Resisting a Temptation Means Living More Positively
headline.print_headline: Resisting a Temptation Means Living More Positively

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
